summary: $PUPS on ETH - $PUPS was the first Meme Coin built on the Bitcoin Network. Ethereum is the original smart contract network that brought us Tokens, NFT’s and Meme Coins in the first place. The time has come to bring $PUPS home to Ethereum. $PUPS took crypto by storm by conducting the first-ever token airdrop on Bitcoin. In recognizing this historical milestone, let us also celebrate the Ethereum Network that made Tokens, NFTs and Meme Coins possible in the first place. Heroes of Ethereum, rise and embrace $PUPS on ETH!
